song.title: Show Me Your Secrets
song.info:
C1 You sit down n then I see you sunk in my sight Just take your hand n light the fire
Ref Show me your secrets n i might let you fly Show me your secrets you'll just open me your mind
C2 You switch off the light you're touching lightly my eyes you make speed my breath i feel all right
C3 You push me away Hope you won't begin to cry i claps you in my arms I'll give you time
